text: 1. Consider the following initial value problem: Y +ay=ad, { 1) y(0) =1. (4 points) (a) Use the integrating factor method to express the solution to problem (1) in terms of an indefinite integral with a constant of integration. o :| (4 points) (b) Evaluate the integral and the constant of integration to find an explicit solution to problem (1). o :| (2 points) (c) What is the maximum interval of existence for the solution of part (a)? o :|
